properties.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Kern County Desert; Lake Isabella; Tehachapi Area
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 1 at 3:10AM PST until March 1 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Hanford CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Lake Isabella, Tehachapi Area, Indian Wells Valley and
Kern County Desert.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds could blow down trees and power lines.
Power outages are possible. Travel could be hazardous,
especially for high profile vehicles such as campers and
tractor trailers.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not
limited to Highway 14, U.S. Highway 395, Highway 178 through and
below Walker Pass, and Highway 58 through and below Tehachapi
Pass, including the town of Mojave.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON
